dt: {bc}to swing on or as if on a {d_link|hinge|hinge:1}

dt.t: These thoughtful amenities include … an outdoor patio TV that {wi}hinges{/wi} outward toward the pool …
… we pulled within feet of a 12-foot crocodile, his huge jaw {wi}hinging{/wi} open in warning to reveal a toothy grin.

dt: {bc}to be contingent on a single consideration or point

dt.t: the prosecution's case {wi}hinges{/wi} on the DNA evidence

shortdef: to swing on or as if on a hinge
to be contingent on a single consideration or point —used with on or upon
to attach by or furnish with hinges
